text: Count Arvid Rutger Fredriksson Posse, born 15 February 1820, dead 24 April 1901, was a Swedish politician. He served as the Prime Minister of Sweden from 1880 to 1883. == References == Category:1820 births Category:1901 deaths Category:Government ministers of Sweden Category:Prime ministers of Sweden Category:Swedish nobility
title: Arvid Posse
